definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Where there is persevere in putting people first, where is the guarantee of the eternal life of architectural decoration industry.
sentences.chinese: 坚持以人为本是建筑装饰装修业生命永存的所在。

sentences.english: I undertake to resume studies following the expiry of the deferment period approved.
sentences.chinese: 本人会于已获批准的延迟修业期完结后复课。

sentences.english: Management System and Customer Satisfaction. for Interior Design .
sentences.chinese: 室内装修业管理系统与顾客满意度之研究。

sentences.english: In the diplomas shall be recorded the length of study and the subjects studied.
sentences.chinese: 结业证书应当载明修业年限和学业内容。

sentences.english: The closing date of study printed on the document of proof will be the date that the penalty is imposed.
sentences.chinese: 修业证明书所载修业截止日期以原处分日期为准。

sentences.english: The closing date of study printed on the document of proof will be the date that the penalty is imposed.
sentences.chinese: 修业证明书所载修业截止日期以原处分日期为准。

sentences.english: Going to study in your business schools is one of the top choices of Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 去贵国商学院修业成为了我国粹子们的首选之一。

sentences.english: Studying for a degree generally takes four to six years.
sentences.chinese: 其修业年限一般需四至六年。

definition: to do research work/to engage in advanced studies
scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study

the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
to learn a skill or art
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
